properties.areaDesc: Wabash, IL; Knox, IN; Gibson, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 3 at 10:10AM EST until January 10 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis IN
properties.description:
...A Flood Warning continues for portions of the following waterways
in Indiana...

White River...

.Additional precipitation across portions of central and southern
Indiana in the last 24 hours will prolong high water along portions
of the lower White River by an additional 24 hours or so. Additional
rainfall is expected late today into Saturday, but should be light
enough that impacts to river levels will be minimal.

The Flood Warning continues for
The White River at Hazleton.
* until Friday January 10.
* There have been no observations in the last 24 hours.
* Flood stage is 16.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...It is forecast to crest at 19.0 feet Monday morning and
will fall below flood stage by Friday January 10.
* At 19.0 feet...Flood waters cover the Hazleton softball field.
Pottsville Road is underwater and impassable.
properties.instruction:
Precautionary/Preparedness Actions...

Motorists should never drive into flood water. Turn around and go
another way. Keep children away from flooded areas. Recreational and
agricultural interests should remain alert to changing river
conditions.

For detailed flood information go to weather.gov/ind on the web and
click on rivers and lakes.
